001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.HistoryLogProps;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006
007@HistoryLogProps(
008    opCode = 203,
009    displayName = "Update Status",
010    internalName = "LID_UPDATE_STATUS"
011)
012public class UpdateStatusHistoryLog extends HistoryLog {
013
014    private int swUpdateStatus;
015    private int metadataAndVersionStatus;
016    private int fullDlAndCrcStatus;
017    private int fileDlAndSideloadStatus;
018    private int externalFlashStatus;
019    private int updateSuccessful;
020    private long swPartNum;
021
022    public UpdateStatusHistoryLog() {}
023    public UpdateStatusHistoryLog(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, int swUpdateStatus, int metadataAndVersionStatus, int fullDlAndCrcStatus, int fileDlAndSideloadStatus, int externalFlashStatus, int updateSuccessful, long swPartNum) {
024        super(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum);
025        this.cargo = buildCargo(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum, swUpdateStatus, metadataAndVersionStatus, fullDlAndCrcStatus, fileDlAndSideloadStatus, externalFlashStatus, updateSuccessful, swPartNum);
026        this.swUpdateStatus = swUpdateStatus;
027        this.metadataAndVersionStatus = metadataAndVersionStatus;
028        this.fullDlAndCrcStatus = fullDlAndCrcStatus;
029        this.fileDlAndSideloadStatus = fileDlAndSideloadStatus;
030        this.externalFlashStatus = externalFlashStatus;
031        this.updateSuccessful = updateSuccessful;
032        this.swPartNum = swPartNum;
033
034    }
035
036    public UpdateStatusHistoryLog(int swUpdateStatus, int metadataAndVersionStatus, int fullDlAndCrcStatus, int fileDlAndSideloadStatus, int externalFlashStatus, int updateSuccessful, long swPartNum) {
037        this(0, 0, swUpdateStatus, metadataAndVersionStatus, fullDlAndCrcStatus, fileDlAndSideloadStatus, externalFlashStatus, updateSuccessful, swPartNum);
038    }
039
040    public int typeId() {
041        return 203;
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * <table border="1">
046     * <caption>Parsed fields for UpdateStatusHistoryLog:</caption>
047     * <tr><td><code>metadataAndVersionStatus</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 10)</code></td></tr>
048     * <tr><td><code>swUpdateStatus</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 12)</code></td></tr>
049     * <tr><td><code>fileDlAndSideloadStatus</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 14)</code></td></tr>
050     * <tr><td><code>fullDlAndCrcStatus</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 16)</code></td></tr>
051     * <tr><td><code>updateSuccessful</code></td><td><code>raw[19]</code></td></tr>
052     * <tr><td><code>externalFlashStatus</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 20)</code></td></tr>
053     * <tr><td><code>swPartNum</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 22)</code></td></tr>
054     * </table>
055     */
056    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
057        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == 26);
058        this.cargo = raw;
059        parseBase(raw);
060        this.metadataAndVersionStatus = Bytes.readShort(raw, 10);
061        this.swUpdateStatus = Bytes.readShort(raw, 12);
062        this.fileDlAndSideloadStatus = Bytes.readShort(raw, 14);
063        this.fullDlAndCrcStatus = Bytes.readShort(raw, 16);
064        this.updateSuccessful = raw[19];
065        this.externalFlashStatus = Bytes.readShort(raw, 20);
066        this.swPartNum = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 22);
067
068    }
069
070    public static byte[] buildCargo(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, int swUpdateStatus, int metadataAndVersionStatus, int fullDlAndCrcStatus, int fileDlAndSideloadStatus, int externalFlashStatus, int updateSuccessful, long swPartNum) {
071        return HistoryLog.fillCargo(Bytes.combine(
072            new byte[]{(byte) 203, 0},
073            Bytes.toUint32(pumpTimeSec),
074            Bytes.toUint32(sequenceNum),
075            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(metadataAndVersionStatus),
076            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(swUpdateStatus),
077            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(fileDlAndSideloadStatus),
078            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(fullDlAndCrcStatus),
079            new byte[]{0, (byte) updateSuccessful},
080            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(externalFlashStatus),
081            Bytes.toUint32(swPartNum)));
082    }
083
084    public int getSwUpdateStatus() {
085        return swUpdateStatus;
086    }
087
088    public int getMetadataAndVersionStatus() {
089        return metadataAndVersionStatus;
090    }
091
092    public int getFullDlAndCrcStatus() {
093        return fullDlAndCrcStatus;
094    }
095
096    public int getFileDlAndSideloadStatus() {
097        return fileDlAndSideloadStatus;
098    }
099
100    public int getExternalFlashStatus() {
101        return externalFlashStatus;
102    }
103
104    public int getUpdateSuccessful() {
105        return updateSuccessful;
106    }
107
108    public long getSwPartNum() {
109        return swPartNum;
110    }
111}
